price: Dan janganlah kamu tukar perjanjianmu dengan Allah dengan harga yang sedikit (murah); sesungguhnya apa yang ada di sisi Allah, itulah yang lebih baik bagimu jika kamu mengetahui.
arabic: وَلَا تَشۡتَرُواْ بِعَهۡدِ ٱللَّهِ ثَمَنٗا قَلِيلًاۚ إِنَّمَا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ هُوَ خَيۡرٞ لَّكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walā tashtarū biʿahdi al-lahi thamanan qalīlan innamā ʿinda al-lahi huwa khayrun lakum in kuntum taʿlamūna
